elite_levels.description: Gains +10% ATK during the duration of the passive skill; When defeating an enemy for the first time, fully restores HP and reactivates the effects of the passive skill
Gains +20% ATK during the duration of the passive skill; When defeating an enemy for the first time, fully restores HP and reactivates the effects of the passive skill
Before defeating an enemy for the first time after each deployment, gains +8 ASPD and reduces all damage taken by 25%

potential_upgrades.description: Before defeating an enemy for the first time after each deployment, gains +10 (+2) ASPD and reduces all damage taken by 30% (+5%)
